channel.title: Simple question, forgot how to do it... lol
channel.description:
Okay so i want to make a custom door. i have picked out the object.
I just need to know how to make it to where there is a right click pass option and whenever you click that it plays emote 2753 then when that emote i at the middle it teles u to the other side.... Here is a pic of somewhat what i want it to look like. but at the end it just teles you.
[IMG]http://i183.photobucket.com/albums/x281/victor123654/0004.png[/img]

item.title: Simple question, forgot how to do it... lol
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

[quote=“I need a username, post:2, topic:300842”]Something like:

if.Object.Equals.Ignorecase(“door id here”);
set.Emote(“2753”);
teletoX = xcoordinate of where to go, EG outside of door;//to get the coordinates just goto
teletoY = ycoordinate of the same thing as above; //wanna tele and type ::mypos[/quote]

YOU FAIL!

@topic, client>class46

copy and pase this under;
class46.method582(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_753);

    if (i == OBJIDHERE) {
        class46.aString739 = "NAME HERE";		
        class46.aByteArray777 = "EXAMINE INFO HERE".getBytes();
    }

this will re-name, and set new examine info, although you will need to search up(google probably) how to set new options like pass
which should look something like class46.aString(blahblahblah)

if you want it just to tele you use the above post
if you want actual doors, you’ll need a doorhandler, which i hope you already have? if not what base are you using?

Read full topic
item.source: Simple question, forgot how to do it... lol

teletoY = ycoordinate of the same thing as above; //wanna tele and type ::mypos
